title: Idling on Fumes: A Nietzschean Discussion with Esther O Reilly
description: In a conversation that starts with the IDW, Esther and I end up discussing Jordan Peterson, the meaning crisis, and much in between...including the importance of dialogue between faith and non faith communities. Oh, we also discuss our thoughts on what exactly Bret Weinstein means when he talks about "we need a replacement" when it comes to religion.
